tool_description: Matches available vehicles from fleet inventory to cargo requirements based on weight, volume, and special handling capabilities.

cargo_volume.description: Total cargo volume in cubic meters

available_vehicles.description: List of available vehicle IDs in fleet

vehicle_capacities.description: Weight capacities in kg for each vehicle (same order as vehicle IDs)

vehicle_volumes.description: Volume capacities in cubic meters for each vehicle

vehicle_types.description: Vehicle type classifications for special cargo handling

max_results.description: Maximum number of vehicle matches to return

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: All vehicle arrays (IDs, capacities, volumes, types) must have the same length.
No suitable vehicles: No vehicles in fleet can handle the specified cargo requirements.
Invalid cargo specifications: Weight and volume must be positive numbers.
Empty vehicle fleet: At least one vehicle must be provided in available_vehicles array.
Invalid max_results: Must be an integer between 1 and 20.
usage: Provide cargo specifications and complete fleet information with matching array lengths. Returns ranked list of suitable vehicles with utilization metrics.

capacity_utilization.description: Weight utilization percentages for matched vehicles

volume_utilization.description: Volume utilization percentages for matched vehicles

compatibility_scores.description: Overall compatibility scores (0-100) for cargo-vehicle matching
